TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClaimsPrincipalPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ClaimsPrincipalPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

summary.span: 表示安全属性，其用于声明性分配访问检查，依据是当前应用程序上下文中的 实例提供的逻辑。

span.span: Represents a security attribute used to declaratively assign access checks based on the logic provided by the instance in the current application context.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 用于以声明方式请求访问检查使用已配置。The is used to declaratively request an access check using the configured . 您必须指定其中一个值，`Resource`和`Operation`中你声明。You must specify one of the values, a `Resource` and an `Operation` in your declaration. `Resource`和`Operation`属性指定的资源和为其操作当前主体 () 必须授权执行以继续。The `Resource` and `Operation` properties specify the resource and action for which the current principal () must be authorized for execution to proceed. 如果当前主体未被授权对指定资源执行指定的操作 （操作）引发。If the current principal is not authorized to perform the specified action (operation) on the specified resource, a is thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类使用由配置的声明授权管理器，设置下属性。The class uses the claims authorization manager configured by the that is set under the property. 这是在所有情况下，即使在其中未使用 WS 联合身份验证; 的方案中 true例如，活动 (WCF) Web 应用程序和控制台应用程序。This is true in all cases, even in scenarios where WS-Federation is not used; for example, active (WCF) Web applications and Console applications. 你可以指定的声明授权管理器配置中或以编程方式。You can specify the claims authorization manager either in configuration or programmatically. 若要在配置文件中指定的声明授权管理器，设置[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素下的[ <identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)元素，并确保，通过引用此标识配置[ <federationConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)由运行时加载的元素 （例如，通过设置`identityConfigurationName`属性)。To specify the claims authorization manager in a configuration file, set the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under an [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element and ensure that this identity configuration is referenced by the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element that is loaded by the runtime (for example, by setting the `identityConfigurationName` attribute). 若要以编程方式设置声明授权管理器，提供的处理程序事件。To set the claims authorization manager programmatically, provide a handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何保护方法的修饰它与属性。The following example shows how to protect a method by decorating it with the attribute. 该属性将评估是否应通过利用提供的逻辑到当前主体授予访问权限应用程序上下文中的实例。The attribute will evaluate whether access should be granted to the current principal by leveraging the logic provided by the instance in the application context. 如果当前主体未被授权对指定的资源，指定操作则引发该异常; 否则为执行将继续。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#4)] 下面的 XML 演示使用自定义声明授权所需的最低配置管理器和类。The following XML shows the minimum configuration required to use a custom claims authorization manager with the class. 你必须在最低限度上，同时声明`system.identityModel`和`system.identityModel.services`中``元素，然后指定在你授权管理器[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素下的默认标识配置。You must, at a minimum, declare both the `system.identityModel` and the `system.identityModel.services` sections in the `` element and then specify your authorization manager in a [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under the default identity configuration. 这将确保从默认联合身份验证配置引用了授权管理器。This will ensure that your authorization manager is referenced from the default federation configuration. 或者，您可以指定授权管理器中在其下的指定的标识配置的名称`identityConfigurationName`属性[ <federationConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)元素。Alternatively, you can specify the name of the identity configuration under which your authorization manager is specified in the `identityConfigurationName` attribute of the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element. ```xml
```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

param.name: action
param.span: 指定可在使用声明安全性时执行的安全操作的值之一。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the security actions that can be performed when using declarative security.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还必须指定`Operation`和`Resource`属性在你声明或引发异常时将引发方法调用来创建权限。You must also specify the `Operation` and `Resource` properties in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is invoked to create the permission.

Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Security", "CA2103:ReviewImperativeSecurity", Justification="It is expected that the runtime’s behavior would rely on changing data")

summary.span: 创建基于当前实例 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates new instance of the class that is based on the current instance.

returns.span: 具有与此实例关联的操作和资源的 。

span.span: A with the operation and resource associated with this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象由使用的值创建属性和属性。The object is created by using the value of the property and the property. 必须指定`Operation`和`Resource`属性在你声明或引发异常时将引发方法调用来创建权限。You must specify the `Operation` and `Resource` properties in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is invoked to create the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Operation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Operation : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置其中应对当前主体授予对指定资源的权限的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the operation for which the current principal should be authorized on the specified resource.

value.span: 应为其授权当前主体的操作。

span.span: The action for which the current principal should be authorized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该操作是当前的主体应授权对指定资源的操作。The operation is the action for which the current principal should be authorized on the specified resource. 必须设置`Operation`属性在你声明或引发异常时将引发调用方法来创建的权限。You must set the `Operation` property in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is called to create the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Resource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Resource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置其上应对主体授予权限以执行指定操作的资源。

span.span: Gets or sets the resource on which the principal should be authorized to perform the specified action (operation).

value.span: 当前主体应该被授权的资源。

span.span: The resource on which the current principal should be authorized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在其的当前主体应该有权执行指定的操作的资源。The resource on which the current principal should be authorized to perform the specified action. 必须设置`Resource`属性在你声明或引发异常时将引发调用方法来创建的权限。You must set the `Resource` property in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is called to create the permission.
